mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASK (ASK_NO, ASK_CONTENT, ASK_REG_DATE, ASK_IP, ASK_USER_ID, ASK_PARENT_NO) VALUES(SEQ_ASK.NEXTVAL, #{askContent}, SYSDATE , '111.11.11.1', #{askUserId}, #{askParentNo})
